name: The Elder Scrolls: Arena
description: Uses the files from the Windows installer from GOG.
notes:
No MIDI audio with pre-configured settings from Windows installer (Linux Mint 19).

To resolve, there are 2 options:

Option 1:
Change dosbox_arena_single.conf, Line 14 from:
@ACD -Ssbpdig.adv -IOS220 -IRQS7 -DMAS1 -Mgenmidi.adv -IOM330 -IRQM2 -DMAM1

to:

@ACD -Ssbpdig.adv -IOS220 -IRQS7 -DMAS1 -Msbfm.adv -IOM220 -IRQM7 -DMAM1

Option 2:
Leave change dosbox_arena_single.conf, Line 14 as:
@ACD -Ssbpdig.adv -IOS220 -IRQS7 -DMAS1 -Mgenmidi.adv -IOM330 -IRQM2 -DMAM

Install fluid-soundfont-gm and fluidsynth.  For Mint 19:
sudo apt install -y fluid-soundfont-gm fluidsynth

Open terminal and run the command (needs to be run each time you want to play):
fluidsynth -l -s -i -aalsa -o audio.alsa.device=default /usr/share/sounds/sf2/FluidR3_GM.sf2

Start the game.
content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
- file2: https://lutris.net/files/tools/innoextract.tar.gz
game:
  config_file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_arena.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file2
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$file1"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/DOSBOX
    src: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_arena_single.conf
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_arena.conf
    key: aspect
    section: render
    value: true
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_arena.conf
    key: output
    section: sdl
    value: overlay
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_arena.conf
    key: fullresolution
    section: sdl
    value: 1920x1080
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_arena.conf
    key: midiconfig
    section: midi
    value: '128:0'
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/dosbox_arena.conf
    key: fullscreen
    section: sdl
    value: false
main_file: DOSBOX/dosbox_arena_single.conf
